name: PROJECT OVERVIEW
content:
PROJECT : Data Integration


Building an ETL example for the scenario involving datasets related to warranty/insurance claims.

We will take the example using Claims Dataset is available in JSON format and Policy Dataset is available in CSV format.

The data will be combined using JOIN operation and then different oeprations like

  • Convert String to Date
  • Extract Date Features
  • Aggreagte Monthly & Average Amount Features

will be carried out on this dataset.


The final feature engineered dataset will be saved to Snowflake.


This data will be then read from Snowflake and using H20 models we wil ltrain a model to detect fraudulent warranty claims.ï»¿
